cards.rules_text:
Whenever a battle enters under your control you may sacrifice a creature, if you do this creature deals damage equal to the sacrificed creatures power to that battle.
Whenever you defeat a battle, put two +1/+1 counters on this creature.

Prowess
[i]Finale — [/i]Whenever an enchantment is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, if this creature isn't a bard it becomes a Human Bard with prowess and exalted, if it's a Human Bard it becomes an Avatar Bard with flying, prowess, and exalted. [i](Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)[/i]

Exalted [i](Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)[/i]
Whenever a creature you control attacks alone you may have this creature become a copy of it except it has this ability and exalted.

Indestructible
Whenever you attack, but don't attack a player, create a treasure token.
Crew 5
cards.rules_text2: [i](You may cast a summon from your hand as a battle protected by an opponent. When defeated, it becomes the artifact.)[/i]

cards.special_text:
[+2]: Exile target permanent you control, you may cast it from exile for as long as you control Tiz, when you do create a 1/1 white Faerie Dragon creature token with flying.
[-2]: Purge target permanent [i](Remove all counters from it, and unattach all auras, equipment, and fortifications from it.)[/i]
[-6]: You get an emblem with “Whenever you cast a spell from exile, you may pay life equal to its mana value, if you do copy it.”

cards.rules_text: Sagas you control have “{1I} — Create a 1/1 white and black Spirit enchantment creature token with decayed.”, “{2I} — Add {C}.”, “{3I} — Add {C}.”, and “{4I} — Draw a card.” in addition to its other abilities.

Flying, prowess
When this creature enters, look at the top card of your library. You may reveal it, if it's a noncreature card put it into your hand. If you don't, you put it into your graveyard.

Deathtouch
Whenever this creature attacks and isn't blocked, proliferate. [i](Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)[/i]

Vigilance
Whenever a triggered ability of a creature you control triggers during combat, you may copy it. Do this only once each turn.

cards.special_text:
[i](As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)[/i]
I — Purge target nonland permanent. [i](Remove all counters from it, and unattach all auras, equipment, and fortifications from it.)[/i]
II — Create a 1/1 white and black Spirit enchantment creature token with decayed.
III — Create a copy of target token you control.

I — Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
II — Creatures you control gain exalted until end of turn.
III — Creatures you control gain trample until end of turn.

cards.rules_text: Flying, Vigilance

cards.rules_text2: [i](You may cast a summon from your hand as a battle protected by an opponent. When defeated, it becomes the creature.)[/i]

cards.rules_text: [i]Finale —[/i] Whenever this or another enchantment is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, create a 1/1 white and black Spirit enchantment creature token with decayed. [i](It can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)[/i]

Prowess
This creature can activate abilities as though it had haste.
{T}: Target creature can't block alone until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.
Exalted, exalted [i](Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)[/i]
[i]Finale —[/i] Whenever an enchantment is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, add {B} or {G}.

This creature enters with four +1/+1 counters.
{2C}{2C}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.
Whenever this creature enters you may purge target permanent you control. [i](Remove all counters from it, and unattach all auras, equipment, and fortifications from it.)[/i]

Defender
As long as you control a Siren or Saga, this creature can attack as though it didn't have defender.

Haste
Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, target creature can't block alone until end of turn.

cards.special_text:
Draw two cards, lose 2 life.
Mill two cards, create a 1/1 blue and red Siren creature token with “{T}: Target creature can't block alone until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.”

[i](As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III)[/i]
Destroy target enchantment or creature with power 4 or greater.
Surveil 1 [i](Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)[/i]
[i]One bad performance sent her career tumbling to the gutter.[/i]

cards.rules_text: When C14 Amphiteater Listener dies, create a Murmur token. [i](It's a colorless Saga Murmur enchantment with “{2I},{3I}— Add {C}.”)[/i]
cards.flavor_text: [i]It's polite to stay until the song is over. But the murmur never ends...[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Ward {2C} [i](Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2C}.)[/i]
[i]Finale [/i]— Whenever C13 Backup Singer or another enchantment is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
cards.notes: Note, Ensorceler: i think aura moving around is not very valuable if you dont have extremely fine control of when it happens, which finale is not

cards.rules_text: The owner of target nonland permanent puts it on the top or bottom of their library, then they create a Murmur token. [i](It's a colorless Saga Murmur enchantment with “{2I},{3I}— Add {C}.”)[/i]
As long as you control a token C17 Rondelli Recruiter gets +1/+0 and has vigilance.
cards.flavor_text: [i]When a sirens ask you to join their song best to respond first.[/i]
cards.notes: Find the right rate keep the condition

cards.rules_text: Whenever C20 Echo of Silence attacks, you may pay {1{G}W}. If you do return target Saga card from your graveyard to your hand.

{B}{B}, Pay 2 life: Create a Murmur token. Activate only if an enchantment left the battlefield this turn, and only once each turn as a sorcery. [i](It's a colorless Saga Murmur enchantment with “{2I},{3I}— Add {C}.”)[/i]

As an additional cost to cast C24 Flaming Resolution you may sacrifice a nontoken enchantment.
C24 Flaming Resolution deals 4 damage to target creature or planeswalker. If you sacrificed an nontoken enchantment as you cast C24 Flaming Resolution it deals 4 damage to any target instead.
Trample, exalted, haste [i](Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)[/i]
When C25 Storykeeper enters, create a Murmur token. [i](It's a colorless Saga Murmur enchantment with “{2I},{3I}— Add {C}.”)[/i]
cards.flavor_text: [i]Let me tell you about the world before the invasion...[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Choose one — 
• Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
• Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
• Put a lore counter on target Saga you control.
Whenever you put a lore counter on a permanent you control, C26 Harmony Essence gets +1/+1 and gains trample until end of turn.

[i]Finale [/i]— Whenever an enchantment is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, look at the top three cards of your library, you may reveal a Saga card from among them and put it into your hand, put the rest into your graveyard.
You may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast Saga spells.

Flash
Menace
When U03 Subito Slicer enters, destroy target creature if it was dealt damage this turn or is a token.

Prowess, prowess
[i]Finale — [/i]Whenever an enchantment is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, add {R}. You don't lose this mana as steps and phases end.

[i]Finale — [/i]Whenever an enchantment is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may have U05 Composed Mercenary fight target creature. [i](Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)[/i]

When UUR02 Siren Choir enters, create X 1/1 blue and red Siren creature tokens with “{T}:Target creature can't block alone until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery”.
Sirens you control have haste.
Murmurs you control have “{2I} — Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.” in addition to its other abilities.
cards.flavor_text: [i]The whispers contain more than just raw magic, let them in and you too can evolve.[/i]
cards.notes: Flavor: Wishes to harness the murmur
